analysis.description:
EtherDiamond.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#185-267) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= direct_drop_range_start && block.timestamp <= direct_drop_range_end) (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#194-200)

EtherDiamond.account_address should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#8-10)
EtherDiamond.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#20-21)
EtherDiamond.direct_drop_address should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#158-162)
EtherDiamond.direct_drop_range should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#170-173)
EtherDiamond.direct_drop_range_end should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#177-179)
EtherDiamond.direct_drop_range_start should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#174-176)
EtherDiamond.direct_drop_rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#156)
EtherDiamond.direct_drop_withdraw_address should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#163-168)
EtherDiamond.initSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#22-25)
EtherDiamond.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#17-18)
EtherDiamond.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x424026544da2ff0cfb60aec1496560c28b47d7e6.sol#18-20)
